body_html:
@lakshayg I'm not currently working on this, and I'd guess @bhairavmehta95 isn't working on it either. So I think it's yours if you want it :)

I'm not familiar enough with the C++ side of TensorFlow to meaningfully comment on your plan, but it seems like a good start at least.
If I were you (and I'm guessing this is what you did), I'd just model the code on another unary matrix op, e.g. matrix inverse.
